identifier.description: The unique identifier for a Geant Feed Object. It is used to sync the PuMuKIT Multimedia Object.

set.description: The provider of the Geant Feed Object. The PuMuKIT Multimedia Object will be tagged with this provider.

status.description: The status of the Geant Feed Object (published, hidden, blocked). Error if not equal to 'published'.

creationDate.description: The date set for the Geant Feed Object. Must follow the ISO 8601 standard to be parsed correctly (YYYY-MM-DD).
